episodes.summary: Episode 2 – The Tomb Greetings all! Listen to us talk about the H.P. Lovecraft story The Tomb. We will be back in two weeks with episode 03 where we will talk about the short story – Dagon.

episodes.title: Episode 1 – H. P. Lovecraft Biography
episodes.author: Chris Lackey & Chad Fifer
episodes.summary: H. P. Lovecraft Biography Listen to the very first episode of the H.P. Lovecraft Literary Podcast. In this episode, we discuss the life and times of H.P. Lovecraft. Next episode: A discussion of The Tomb.
